attributes.action: Make preparation for immediate relief to be sent to Zimbabwe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If Mugabe loses power in the forthcoming elections; I would ask the Prime Minister to put immediate relief plans into action to bring food and welfare to the suffering residents of this forgotten and neglected country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
